price: বৰং আল্লাহেই হৈছে তোমালোকৰ অভিভাৱক আৰু তেৱেঁই উত্তম সহায়কাৰী।
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
